verses.verse: Bless <S%H1288><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, O my soul <S%H5315><s%>: and all that is inside <S%H7130><s%> me <S%H6944><s%>, bless his holy name <S%H8034><s%>.
Bless <S%H1288><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, O my soul <S%H5315><s%>, and forget <S%H7911><s%> not all his benefits <S%H1576><s%>:
Who forgives <S%H5545><s%> all your iniquities <S%H5771><s%>; who heals <S%H7495><s%> all your diseases <S%H8463><s%>;
Who redeems <S%H1350><s%> your life <S%H2416><s%> from destruction <S%H7845><s%>; who crowns <S%H5849><s%> you with lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> and tender mercies <S%H7356><s%>;
Who satisfies <S%H7646><s%> your mouth <S%H5716><s%> with good <S%H2896><s%> things <S%H5271><s%>; so that your youth is renewed <S%H2318><s%> like the eagle <S%H5404><s%>'s.
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> executes <S%H6213><s%> righteousness <S%H6666><s%> and judgment <S%H4941><s%> for all that are oppressed <S%H6231><s%>.
He made known <S%H3045><s%> his ways <S%H1870><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, his acts <S%H5949><s%> unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> is merciful <S%H7349><s%> and gracious <S%H2587><s%>, slow <S%H750><s%> to anger <S%H639><s%>, and plentiful <S%H7227><s%> in mercy <S%H2617><s%>.
He will not always <S%H5331><s%> argue <S%H7378><s%>: neither will he keep <S%H5201><s%> his anger for ever <S%H5769><s%>.
He has not dealt <S%H6213><s%> with us after our sins <S%H2399><s%>; nor rewarded <S%H1580><s%> us according to our iniquities <S%H5771><s%>.
For as the heaven <S%H8064><s%> is high above <S%H1361><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%>, so great <S%H1396><s%> is his mercy <S%H2617><s%> toward them that fear him <S%H3373><s%>.
As far as <S%H7368><s%> the east <S%H4217><s%> is from the west <S%H4628><s%>, so far has he removed <S%H7368><s%> our transgressions from us <S%H6588><s%>.
Like as a father <S%H1><s%> pities <S%H7355><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%>, so the Lord <S%H3068><s%> pities <S%H7355><s%> them that fear him <S%H3373><s%>.
For he knows <S%H3045><s%> our frame <S%H3336><s%>; he remembers <S%H2142><s%> that we are dust <S%H6083><s%>.
As for man <S%H582><s%>, his days <S%H3117><s%> are as grass <S%H2682><s%>: as a flower <S%H6731><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%>, so he flourishes <S%H6692><s%>.
For the wind <S%H7307><s%> passes over <S%H5674><s%> it <S%H4725><s%>, and it is gone; and the place there shall know it no more <S%H5234><s%>.

But the mercy <S%H2617><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is from everlasting <S%H5769><s%> to <S%H5704><s%> everlasting <S%H5769><s%> upon them that fear <S%H3373><s%> him <S%H6666><s%>, and his righteousness unto children <S%H1121><s%>'s sons <S%H1121><s%>;
To such as keep <S%H8104><s%> his covenant <S%H1285><s%>, and to those that remember <S%H2142><s%> his commandments <S%H6490><s%> to do them <S%H6213><s%>.
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> has prepared <S%H3559><s%> his throne <S%H3678><s%> in the heavens <S%H8064><s%>; and his kingdom <S%H4438><s%> rules over all <S%H4910><s%>.

Bless <S%H1288><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, you his angels <S%H4397><s%>, that excel <S%H1368><s%> in strength <S%H3581><s%>, that do <S%H6213><s%> his commandments <S%H1697><s%>, hearkening <S%H8085><s%> unto the voice <S%H6963><s%> of his word <S%H1697><s%>.
Bless <S%H1288><s%> you the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, all you his hosts <S%H6635><s%>; you ministers <S%H8334><s%> of his <S%H6213><s%>, that do his pleasure <S%H7522><s%>.
Bless <S%H1288><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, all his works <S%H4639><s%> in all places <S%H4725><s%> of his dominion <S%H4475><s%>: bless <S%H1288><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, O my soul <S%H5315><s%>.
